c2.name: Beth: Unbound Form
c2.effect: The duration of **Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II** is increased by 2s.

c3.name: Flawless Alchemistress
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Alchemania
c4.effect: Every 7 Normal and Charged Attacks, Sucrose will reduce the CD of **Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308** by 1-7s.

c5.name: Caution: Standard Flask
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Chaotic Entropy
c6.effect: If **Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II** triggers an Elemental Absorption, all party members gain a 20% Elemental DMG Bonus for the corresponding absorbed element during its duration.
